project.name: J-C459A-CMUD-01-ST02-DT03-DF05-CF25-01
project.description: This test takes in an integer n. It creates n temporary files, and fills them with data. It then attempts to clean up, deleting the last 50 of the temporary files, leaving any files created before those in the temp directory.

iopair.name: J-C459A-CMUD-01-ST02-DT03-DF05-CF25-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining size value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
